divs: Sighting Detailsit was late on my way home when i saw a red light zoom over head then a blue lightmabe 60 ft above so i ran up to a neibors house and nocked on the door .the lady awnserd and thought i was nuts so her husband came out with his boys and a video camera an more red and blue lights vipping down the mountain from the south heading north verylow and over the hills to the north twenty total ...but in the middle was like to squers hooked together tumbling slowly .they were translucent with a oil in water sheen .the man was trying to film it but nothing he kept saying this is weird i just charved this an when it was all over video camera started working and jet s from all directions came swarming in atlest 10 or so
Summary: small fleet of ufos and mother ship
